paper_abstract: We give a deterministic O (hn(1+1/h))-time (2h)-approximation nonadaptive algorithm for 1-median selection in n-point metric spaces, where h is an element of Z(+) \ {1} is arbitrary. Our proof generalizes that of Chang [2]. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A deterministic sublinear-time nonadaptive algorithm for metric 1-median selection
